Dialogue.Page: I'm Ernesto of the core! I'm a star, so it's okay to say here is the core of the star, right?
Well, I used to be Nerine's pet, and I love it here so much I've been living here ever since. I love gravity!
Nerine had the theory that these crystals could even produce life, so she took the deadly material and left the core here. It's amazing how it has grown into a planet like this!
She also liked the gravitational properties, and apparently brought some to the festival in the hopes that it might be used to manipulate black holes. That brings back memories!
I think I'll go after the core later too. See you!
